widget.name: BounceBack
widget.description: A platform to show up success and failure stories of your life. When you don't have friends to share your failure/depression, this is a platform where you can share and get motivated/inspired by people like you. You can also share Fictional stories that provoke a thought to be better in life
widget.author: Devid Lingampally(devidlingampally@gmail.com) and Sagar Rodda(sksagar.r@gmail.com)
